ai-patthana13.16:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found.
ai-patthana13.16:1.1_0: There is no basis for the path that gives rise to the support.
ai-patthana13.16:1.1_1: There is no basis for the path, no cause or condition for the unity.
ai-patthana13.16:1.1_2: There is no basis for the path that gives rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana13.16:1.1_3: Dependence on the path, confidence, and those that arise because of the path.
ai-patthana13.16:1.1_4: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the path and the causes and reason.
ai-patthana13.16:1.1_5: Supportacts on the road, based on the path, there are no cause or reason.
ai-patthana13.16:1.1_6: Perception is no basis for the path, supported by the relying on the path, and conditioned by which arise because of the path.
ai-patthana13.16:2.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
